title: MAESTRO ERROR PLEASE HELP
body: So basically whenever i log into my lol account, it doesnt pop up immediately but after like 2 to 3 minutes this thing pops up saying "Maestro Error ,League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro .Please try restarting the client." I've done everything i could, disabling firewall,antivirus,restarted multiple times. and none of it has been working.It automatically shuts me off of league.Pleas Help

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble establishing a connection with our authentication servers.  If you're still having an issue with this, check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to reconfigure your network and fix this up for good.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterwards!
